Description: Poster showing the Triple Entente allies of Russia, France, and the United Kingdom. The upper inscription reads "agreement". Shown are the female personifications of the three countries. In center, Russia holds aloft an Orthodox Cross, Britannia on the right with an anchor, and Marianne on the left with a heart.
